items.title: Ace
items.description:
"There is no chasm too wide, no wall too thick, that will stop me from bringing you home. 
 — ace"

items.title: Bandit
items.description:
"I used to be undercover. I did time. I had to deal drugs. I even had to kill. And I was so good at it that, it got me a promotion."
— bandit

items.title: Mira
items.description:
"Think of me as your conscience. I see everything, and I am just as ruthless."
— mira

items.title: Blackbeard
items.description:
"I am a diver. We are used to seeing threats through a layer of tempered glass."
— blackbeard

items.title: Warden
items.description:
"I was trapped, for a long time. Lived and seen things, you could not imagine. Now I see things... in a different light."
— warden

items.title: Caveira
items.description:
"Not every child gets to choose who they grow up to be."
— caveira
